title: Cadence: Secrets of Wings
description: When demons corrupt the souls of the innocent, angels take matters into their own hands... Cadence, a half angel, descends from Heaven to save a damaged soul from evil. Cadence discovers that this is no ordinary mission and she is not a typical angel.  When Cadence discovers her miraculous abilities, she is in desperate pursuit of the truth. Her quest to save the girl intertwines with a thick web of secrets. After an adventure overflowing with evil, forbidden love, enemies, loyalty, blood, and sacrifice, Cadence is guided towards the truth. When she untangles the secret of her wings, nothing will ever be the same.
author: R.L. Lib
